name: google_search
description: A Google search result API. When you need a short and clear answer to a specific question, you can use it. The input should be a search query.

k.description: Select first k results in the search results as response.

name: get_current_info
description: Get the current time, date, day, month and year, or timestamp based on the format specified.

name: terminal_command
description: Execute a terminal command and return the output, error, and status code.

timeout.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for the command to complete. This overrides the default_timeout if both are provided.

default_timeout.description: The default timeout value (in seconds) to use if no specific timeout is provided. This value is used as the fallback timeout.

encoding.description: The encoding to use for decoding the command's output and error messages.

verbose.description: Enable verbose mode to log additional information about the command execution process.

output_limit.description: The maximum size (in bytes) of the command's output.

max_retries.description: The maximum number of retries to attempt if the command fails due to temporary issues.
